articles.description: The growth of "smart" farm machinery is increasing the risk of hacking of food and farming systems.
articles.content:
By Claire Marshall & Malcolm PriorBBC Rural Affairs Team
Image source, Claire Marshall
Image caption, Farm robots that operate autonomously are becoming a reality
Modern "smart" farm machinery… [+5399 chars]

articles.author: Kris Boratyn
articles.title: Drivers will regret choosing hybrids over EVs says former Top Gear host - 'not as good!' - Express
articles.description: UK DRIVERS will regret choosing hybrids over electric cars, a former TopGear presenter has claimed. He added that buying an EV is a 'much better financial decision'.
